titles.title: To repeal the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 relating to the taxation of up to one-half of an individual's social security and certain railroad retirement benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Repeals Internal Revenue Code provisions that include social security and tier I railroad retirement benefits in the gross income of certain taxpayers.
